# -10 - IR-cmd: 0x00E0 [ 2 (NEC) 0xff00 0x0007]

# Program - IR-cmd: 0x0080 [ 2 (NEC) 0xff00 0x0001]

# +10 - IR-cmd: 0x0000 [ 2 (NEC) 0xff00 0x0000]

# play/pause - IR-cmd: 0x0060 [ 2 (NEC) 0xff00 0x0006]

# back - IR-cmd: 0x0020 [ 2 (NEC) 0xff00 0x0004]

# for - IR-cmd: 0x00C0 [ 2 (NEC) 0xff00 0x0003]

# strop - IR-cmd: 0x00A0 [ 2 (NEC) 0xff00 0x0005]

# repeat - IR-cmd: 0x0040 [ 2 (NEC) 0xff00 0x0002]
